verses.name: Hosea 10:1
verses.text: Israel is an empty vine, he bringeth forth fruit unto himself: according to the multitude of his fruit he hath increased the altars; according to the goodness of his land they have made goodly images.

verses.name: Hosea 10:2
verses.text: Their heart is divided; now shall they be found faulty: he shall break down their altars, he shall spoil their images.

verses.name: Hosea 10:3
verses.text: For now they shall say, We have no king, because we feared not the Lord; what then should a king do to us?
